DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety and efficacy of transitioning uncontrolled glaucoma patients to DuoTrav from other mono or adjunctive therapies.
DOC.brief_title: Success of Transitioning Uncontrolled Glaucoma Patients From Prior Mono or Adjunctive Therapy to DuoTrav
DOC.criteria: Adults with primary openangle glaucoma, ocular hypertension or pigment dispersion glaucoma. Other protocoldefined inclusion criteria may apply. Age related. Other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply.
